snippet: Apple's new Next Generation MacBook Pro adds a powerful new laptop to the company's product line, but that addition also makes the company's product line a little more confusing. Apple's MacBook Pro line requires more parsing on the part of the...
abstract: Apple's new Next Generation MacBook Pro adds a powerful new laptop to the company's product line, but that addition also makes the company's product line a little more confusing. Apple's MacBook Pro line requires more parsing on the part of the consumer today than it did yesterday.
